text: Hianagi kagra mago ne'mofavre kasentenanke'na, Nagra aza hanena ha' vahe'amo'za hara eme huontegosaze. Na'ankure ana mofavremofo agi'a Solomonikino, 22:9 Hibru kefina Solomoni'ema hu'neana rimpa frue huno hu'ne. agrama kegavama hania knafina Israeli vahera hara osu knare hu'za zamarimpa fru hu'za manigahaze.
